page.title: 15OGBOURNE ST ANDREW SCHOOL
page.content: The school building is approximately 125 years old.It was a village primary school until about 10 years ago when it was closed as a state school but remained open as an{independent {school.}There are 35{pupils}ranging from 3-11 years.3 and 4 year olds attend in the morning,5-11 year olds attend from 9.00-3.30.They all wear a red and grey uniform.The school has a {headmistress,}Miss Platt,who was the head before it became independent and lives next to the school.She has 3 part-time{teachers}too.Other members of staff are a cook,caretaker and cleaner.School{meals}are cooked in an ordinary kitchen.When we visited they had Pizza Pie and apple crumble and custard;the children said it was nice. After dinner the children go out to play but the{grounds}are small with only a few sports facilities.
